EmailTemplate.name: 17.CEM.MotiveCDP.none.L.G.G.12127.CDP pay as you go.US Response
EmailTemplate.subject: Nokia Pay as your go IoT device management
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Hello {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
Thank you for contacting us regarding Nokia’s "Pay as you go IoT device management". One of our colleagues will call you within 2 business days. If you have not already done so, please check out our solution <[[https://resources.nokia.com/asset/201261]]>, start the free developer trial <[[https://aws.amazon.com/marketplace/pp/B06WW31W8J?qid=1501082751104&sr=0-1&ref_=srh_res_product_title]]>, and learn how to onboard IoT devices <[[C:\Users\gvolland\AppData\Local\Temp\Onboard IoT devices]]>.
Best regards, Rob Clarke Business Development Director Pay as you go IoT device management Nokia Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
